pages.title: Distance & Isolation
pages.text: Build reactors far from important structures (at least 50+ blocks). Create a dedicated nuclear zone. Use fences or void space to isolate the reactor from the rest of your base.

pages.title: Radiation Hazards
pages.text: Spent fuel rods are radioactive. Don't carry them in your inventory longer than necessary. Use hoppers, pipes, or item transport to move spent fuel directly to storage or breeder reactors.
